// src/components/HeroSection.js import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../components/HeroSection.css'; const HeroSection = () => { const [experts, setExperts] = useState([{ title: '', salary: '', subject: '' }]); const addRow = () => { setExperts([...experts, { title: '', salary: '', subject: '' }]); }; const handleInputChange = (index, event) => { const { name, value } = event.target; const newExperts = [...experts]; newExperts[index][name] = value; setExperts(newExperts); }; return (

Align my assets with my values

Prioritize values, to achieve high-performance growth.

Join thousands of investors to vote down egregious CEO pay that is robbing you of your high-performance investment returns.

See how much of your profits are disappearing - up to 25% annually

Learn to build your own high-performance portfolio.



About Us

This site is being developed by Michael Cooper, an investor in small cap stocks who got tired of underperforming CEOs enriching themselves without delivering value to all other stakeholders, including employees and investors. Through this site, we will build investor tools to enable investors to find ways to profit by understanding which CEOs and other executives are truly aligned with your objectives. Double down on inequality, double up on investor returns. Our platform is designed to empower investors with the knowledge and tools they need to make informed decisions. Our mission is to create a community of investors who are committed to ethical investing. We will provide resources and insights to help you identify and support companies that prioritize fair compensation and responsible management. By leveraging our tools, you can track executive pay, analyze company performance, and participate in shareholder activism. We believe that transparency and accountability in corporate leadership are essential for long-term success. Join us in this journey to build a fairer, more sustainable investment landscape. Let's hold executives accountable and reward companies that align with our values. With your support, we can drive positive change and achieve high-performance growth that benefits everyone involved. Together, we can push for a more equitable distribution of corporate wealth, ensuring that all stakeholders benefit from the company's success.



Chat Section

Ask a Question

Is Tesla producing at full capacity?

How serious is Tesla's problem with battery disposal?

Does Musk deserve $50 billion pay?

Bidding

# 1.50 / min call + $700 bonus potential

# 0.50/min call + $100.00 bonus potential

Subject Matter Experts

Investors Chat with Subject Matter Experts
